title: Awful hotel, rude staff and a waste of money
text:
I've travelled all day from the uk and the second thing I'm doing is posting this. The first was having to pay an extra Â£100 a night to have a room that would actually fit two people.
Reception weren't overly helpful and the so called manager I woke to on the phone was even worse, If she's in charge it's no wonder things are bad. Especially when the bell boy knows not to give out her name.
We're here for 4 days for my daughters birthday and I'll be contacting BA in the morning in the hopes of escaping this place.
See the pics for the prison style room but even the stupidly expensive studio has a half bath that's ridiculously old and worn and chipped furnishings.
Not the best start to what should be a celebratory trip but outside this nightmare building will make up for it and I'm hoping we won't be staying.
Pics below of the bathroom, so small it doesn't have a door, just like the wardrobe, the tv is mounted on the mirror at a 90 degree angle and the width of the room is pretty much the bed.
This really isn't the place to stay.
